chinese: 於皇時周。陟其高山、嶞山喬嶽、允猶翕河。敷天之下、裒時之對、時周之命。
english: Oh! great now is Zhou.We ascend the high hills,Both those that are long and narrow, and the lofty mountains;Yes, and [we travel] along the regulated He,All under the sky,Assembling those who now respond to me.Thus it is that the appointment belongs to Zhou.
